alert.note: Alert for Fremont (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 10 at 5:21PM MDT until September 10 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Fremont County in central Wyoming... * Until 600 PM MDT. * At 521 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles west of Sweetwater Station, which is also 25 miles southeast of Lander, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. Significant hail accumulation on roads is expected. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 510 PM, hail size up to an inch was reported, with significant ground accumulation. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Fremont County. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
